boofcv.alg.transform.pyramid
Class PyramidUpdateIntegerDown<T extends ImageSingleBand>

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.transform.pyramid.PyramidUpdateIntegerDown<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
PyramidUpdater<T,PyramidDiscrete<T>>, PyramidUpdaterDiscrete<T>
public class PyramidUpdateIntegerDown<T extends ImageSingleBand>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PyramidUpdaterDiscrete<T>

Convolves a re-normalizable blur kernel across the image before down sampling. This is useful for creating a Gaussian pyramid as well as other standard pyramids.

NOTE: This blur magnitude is constant for each level in the pyramid. In general it is desirable to have it dependent on each level's scale factor.

Author:
Peter Abeles
